name: FastFood
description:
Hey,

this is our game for the #WeeklyGameJam 31.

Instructions:

- Select the different Items to take them

- Put each item in the correct order onto the plate

- Be carefull, if you make a mistake - it will explode and you have to start over again

Credits:

Music & SFX: 
  Batterfingers

Programming & Modelling: 
  dasPanjo

Thank you for playing!
